actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to include podiatrists' services as physician services for the purposes of the medical assistance program authorized by that title.

summary.text: Amends Title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to include podiatrist's services as physician services for the purposes of the medical assistance program of that Title.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to include podiatrists' services as physician services for the purposes of the medical assistance program authorized by that title.
